safetyTips: All our food is made by hand in our purpose-built kitchen at the bottom of our founder's garden. Our suppliers deliver to our doorstep. We work with masks to prep, and gloves to deliver. We do doorstep drops only, and payment is made online .
name: Rock My Bowl
description: We are a boutique catering company based in Brockley, South East London. We deliver breakfast and lunch to doorsteps around South East London. Our menu is mainly vegetarian and seasonal. Check out our Instagram: rockmybowl. We work with local suppliers and artisans.
